t: R&D, Lab Testing Services | Saskatchewan Research Council
s: The Saskatchewan Research Council (SRC) is one of Canada’s leading providers of applied research, development and demonstration (RD&D) and technology commercialization. SRC provides products and services to its 1,500 clients in 20 countries around the world.

t: Saskatchewan Research Council - YouTube
s: SRC has worked around the world for more than 60 years, developing smart science solutions that strengthen and benefit the environment, society and the economy. Driven by our passion for a better world, we break boundaries and reveal the secrets of science. Follow us on this exciting journey.

t: Saskatchewan Research Council Celebrates New Indigenous Workforce Program | News and Media | Government of Saskatchewan
s: Today, the Saskatchewan Research Council (SRC) is pleased to officially launch its Indigenous Workforce Program and celebrate the inaugural cohort of students in a re-imagined Indigenous Summer Student Program, Kiskiyihta (Kiskee ih-taah).
